Invocations for if you are stricken by i.ARABIC_TEXT: ((يَسْتَعِيذُ بِاللَّهِ و يَنْتَهِي عَمَّا شك فِيهِ)).
Invocations for if you are stricken by i.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Say:) I seek refuge in Allah. (Then you should desist from doing what you are in doubt about.)

Invocations for if you are stricken by i.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (He should say: (I have believed in Allah and His Messenger.))

Invocations for if you are stricken by i.ARABIC_TEXT: ((يَقْرَأُ قَوْلَهُ تَعَالَى: ﴿هُوَ الْأوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظّاهِرُ وَالْباطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ﴾)).
Invocations for if you are stricken by i.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (He should also recite the following verse: ( Huwa al-awwalu, waal-akhiru, waalththahiru waalbatinu wahuwa bikulli shayin AAaleem))
Invocations for if you are stricken by i.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (He should also recite the following verse: (He is The First and The Last, Aththahir and Al-Batin and He knows well all things.)(ththahir: Indicates the greatness of His attributes and the insignificance of every single creation in respect to His greatness and Highness, for He is above all of His creation as regards His essence and attributes.)(Al-Batin: Indicates His awareness and knowledge of all secrets, of that which is in the hearts and the most intimate of things just as it indicates His closeness and nearness to all in a manner which befits His majesty.))
